mapper.sql: a.uuid AS "uuid", a.xmmc AS "xmmc", a.prjnum AS "prjnum", a.prjname AS "prjname", a.gcdz AS "gcdz", a.zjjgmc AS "zjjgmc", a.zjcorpcode AS "zjcorpcode", a.prjsize AS "prjsize", a.econcorpname AS "econcorpname", a.econcorpcode AS "econcorpcode", a.prjapprovalnum AS "prjapprovalnum", a.buldplannum AS "buldplannum", a.projectplannum AS "projectplannum", a.citynum AS "citynum", a.countynum AS "countynum", a.prjtypenum AS "prjtypenum", a.prjfunctionnum AS "prjfunctionnum", a.sbr AS "sbr", a.sbryddh AS "sbryddh", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.sfzps AS "sfzps", a.updateflag AS "updateflag", a.fetchdate AS "fetchdate", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.updateuser AS "updateuser", a.updatedate AS "updatedate", a.status AS "status", a.jsxz AS "jsxz", a.tzlx AS "tzlx", c.CodeInfo AS "jsxzLabel"
LEFT JOIN dbo.tbPrjPropertyDic c on a.jsxz = c.Code
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ap_zjsbb a
CountyNum = '320211'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ap_zjsbb( uuid, xmmc, prjnum, prjname, gcdz, zjjgmc, zjcorpcode, prjsize, econcorpname, econcorpcode, prjapprovalnum, buldplannum, projectplannum, citynum, countynum, prjtypenum, prjfunctionnum, sbr, sbryddh, createdate, sfzps, updateflag, fetchdate, updatetime, updateuser, updatedate, status, jsxz, tzlx ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{xmmc}, #{prjnum}, #{prjname}, #{gcdz}, #{zjjgmc}, #{zjcorpcode}, #{prjsize}, #{econcorpname}, #{econcorpcode}, #{prjapprovalnum}, #{buldplannum}, #{projectplannum}, #{citynum}, #{countynum}, #{prjtypenum}, #{prjfunctionnum}, #{sbr}, #{sbryddh}, #{createdate}, #{sfzps}, #{updateflag}, #{fetchdate}, #{updatetime}, #{updateuser}, #{updatedate}, #{status}, #{jsxz}, #{tzlx} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ap_zjsbb SET uuid = #{uuid}, xmmc = #{xmmc}, prjnum = #{prjnum}, prjname = #{prjname}, gcdz = #{gcdz}, zjjgmc = #{zjjgmc}, zjcorpcode = #{zjcorpcode}, prjsize = #{prjsize}, econcorpname = #{econcorpname}, econcorpcode = #{econcorpcode}, prjapprovalnum = #{prjapprovalnum}, buldplannum = #{buldplannum}, projectplannum = #{projectplannum}, citynum = #{citynum}, countynum = #{countynum}, prjtypenum = #{prjtypenum}, prjfunctionnum = #{prjfunctionnum}, sbr = #{sbr}, sbryddh = #{sbryddh}, createdate = #{createdate}, sfzps = #{sfzps}, updateflag = #{updateflag}, fetchdate = #{fetchdate}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, updateuser = #{updateuser}, updatedate = #{updatedate}, status = #{status}, jsxz = #{jsxz}, tzlx = #{tzlx} WHERE id = #{id}
